narrative.title: 90 Leichte Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: German Light Motorized Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile light infantry division for deep desert operations, flank security, and pursuit operations. Lacked heavy armor but compensated with firepower from artillery and anti-tank guns. Designed for rapid movement and exploitation.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain and rocky desert - Cyrenaica/western Egypt frontier

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Independent operations far from supply bases
Combined arms coordination with Italian mobile forces

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain and rocky desert - Cyrenaica/western Egypt frontier
